urls.title: '60,000 cancer patients may die': Oncologist on the coronavirus dilemma | ITV News
urls.description: Usually in April, wards see 30,000 people diagnosed with cancer. Prof Sikora "would be surprised if that number reaches 5,000" this month. | ITV National News
